settings.question: How long will my order take to arrive?
settings.answer: Most orders ship within 2–5 business days and arrive in 7–10 business days depending on your location. We move fast — but global resistance takes time to reach every corner. See our Shipping Policy for more details.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes. BØRN RZST™ is a global movement. We ship worldwide so anyone can wear resistance.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: As soon as your order ships, you’ll receive a confirmation email with a tracking link. Updates may take 24–48 hours to reflect.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: You can return unworn, unwashed items within 14 days of delivery. Please check our full Returns & Exchanges Policy for details.

settings.question: Can I exchange for a different size?
settings.answer: Absolutely. If your item doesn’t fit, you can request a size exchange within 14 days. Just make sure it’s in original condition.

settings.question: What do I do if my item arrives damaged?
settings.answer: Contact us immediately with your order number and a photo of the issue. We’ll make it right — no one should carry resistance with flaws.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and secure online payment methods supported in your country.

settings.question: Is my payment information secure?
settings.answer: Yes. Payments are encrypted and processed through trusted providers. Your data is protected — always. Review our Privacy Policy.

settings.question: Where do the donations go?
settings.answer: For Drop 1, 100% of profits are directed to verified humanitarian aid for Gaza. Ongoing drops will donate 50% of profits. We publish transparency updates so you see exactly where the impact lands.

settings.question: How can I verify donations?
settings.answer: Each campaign includes QR codes linking to receipts and verification pages. Resistance thrives on transparency.

settings.question: How can I get involved beyond buying?
settings.answer: You can join the #WearYourResistance Challenge, submit your story, or sign up to become a creator in our movement hub.

settings.question: How do I wash my shirt/hoodie without damaging the print?
settings.answer: Turn garments inside-out, wash cold, and hang dry for longest life. Iron inside-out if needed — but avoid the print area.

settings.question: Are your products sustainable or ethically made?
settings.answer: Yes. We work with print-on-demand partners who meet global sustainability standards. Each piece is made to order — no overproduction, no waste.
